weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Announces $50 Billion in Awards to Strengthen Rural Health in All 50 States
weekly_top_story.summary: CMS awarded funding under the $50 billion Rural Health Transformation Program to all 50 states and established a new Office of Rural Health Transformation, significantly boosting infrastructure and access to care in underserved rural areas critical for healthcare equity.

stories.headline: FDA Asks For Removal Of Suicide Warnings On GLP-1 Drugs
stories.summary: The FDA directed Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to remove warnings about suicidal thoughts from labels of their blockbuster GLP-1 weight-loss drugs, potentially expanding safe prescribing practices amid widespread use for obesity and diabetes management.

stories.headline: A New Milestone In The Cancer Fight: 7 In 10 Patients Now Survive Five-Plus Years
stories.summary: The American Cancer Society reports that 70% of U.S. cancer patients now survive five years post-diagnosis, a major leap from prior decades driven by treatment advances, reshaping oncology care and patient outcomes.
